object_work_type: digital prints artists' proofs colour slides
physical_appearance: "The image shows a digital print, an artist's proof, and a slide. They are rectangular in shape. The background of the digital print and artist's proof are purple in colour. They feature the backs of two workers, which are facing the direction in which the photograph was captured. Their heads are covered with red headgear, and they are carrying blue pails. Patches of grass can be seen on the ground. The image at the bottom shows a slide. It is black-and-white in colour. It is held in place by a frame. On the borders of the frame, ""Two Workers"" is stated at the bottom for the image at the bottom. ""Tan Lip Seng
creator_1: Tan, Lip Seng, 1942- Tan, Lip Seng
subject_terms_1: A.R.P.S. AFIAP prints (visual works) proofs (prints by function) slides (photographs)
subject_terms_2: 96A Tiong Bahru Road. Singapore 3"" is stated at the bottom for the image at the bottom. " Digitally printed materials Slides (photography) Colour prints Proofs (Printing)
